This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0742 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
00 Effective weight calculatedEffective weight calculated
01 Hospital specific contractHospital specific contract
03 Eeffective weight for transfer/referral calculatedEeffective weight for transfer/referral calculated
04 Referral from other hospital based on a cooperation (no DRG reimbursement)Referral from other hospital based on a cooperation (no DRG reimbursement)
05 Invalid length of stayInvalid length of stay
10 No information/entry in cost data for this DRGNo information/entry in cost data for this DRG
11 No relative weight found for department (type)No relative weight found for department (type)

name: DrgStatusFinancialCalculation
title: drgStatusFinancialCalculation
description: Code system of concepts specifying the status of the diagnosis related group (DRG) calculation regarding the financial aspects.  US Realm. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the DRG segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0742 (DRG Status Financial Calculation)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain
